name: 30-60-90 Days Plan
description: 30-60-90 Day plan is typically known as a tool for people to transit and onboard successfully. Suitable for: Young working professional who are transitioning in their roles/companiesWho may have these pain points: Feel that career transition can be overwhelming Are not sure what to do, what to look out for Want to see what planning options there are Looking for: Simple structure to reflect and plan with examples for the 3 types of goals (learning, performance, and personal goals) Bonus tips and
features: Young working professional who are transitioning in their roles/companies; Feel that career transition can be overwhelming; Are not sure what to do, what to look out for; Want to see what planning options there are; Simple structure to reflect and plan with examples for the 3 types of goals (learning, performance, and personal goals); Bonus tips and guiding questions; Free Notion template with guiding questions, plannings and tips segregated at the 30/60/90 day marks.
